original_text: If therefore Demetrius and the craftsmen with him have a complaint against anyone, the courts are open, and there are proconsuls. Let them bring charges against one another.
korean_text: 만일 데메드리오와 그와 함께 있는 직공들이 누구에게 고발할 것이 있으면 재판 날도 있고 총독들도 있으니 피차 고소할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If therefore Demetrius and the craftsmen with him have a complaint against anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 데메드리오와 그와 함께 있는 장인들이 누구에게든 불만이 있다면

sentences.original_text: Let them bring charges against one another
